thread.title: Use a Tape Measure Like a Pro With These Handy Tips
thread.title_full: Use a Tape Measure Like a Pro With These Handy Tips

author: Patrick Allan
title: Use a Tape Measure Like a Pro With These Handy Tips
text:
Go to permalink 
The tape measure is a tried and true tool that every craftsman should have in their toolbox. Whether you’re new to building things or an experienced tape measure veteran, you’ll probably learn a thing or two in this lesson. 
In this video from the Essential Craftsmen YouTube channel , Scott Wadsworth explains how a tape measure works, how to use it, and handy tricks you can do with it. For example, you can use your tape measure as a compass if you latch the hook on a nail, use the edge of the hook as a quick way to mark wood for cutting, and you can use the tape of your tape measure as a makeshift straight edge if you need to draw straight line. It won’t be perfect, but it works fine for some purposes. Wadsworth shares many more useful tape measure tricks, so be sure to watch the whole thing.
